CustomField.description: calculates the number of business days (exclude weekends) between the date load received and the payroll run date
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Payroll_Run_Date__c),
(today() - Date_Client_Load_Received__c - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(Payroll_Run_Date__c - Date_Client_Load_Received__c - 2*( floor((Payroll_Run_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: Business Days to Run
